Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet for schema compilation and validation. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 包含 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 和 XML 数据简化 (XDR) 架构的缓存。

span.span: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) and XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schemas.

summary.span: 类已过时。

span.span: The class class is obsolete.

summary.span: 请改用 。

span.span: Use instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用已加载的架构方法，这时架构将与命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 关联。Schemas are loaded using the method, at which time the schema is associated with a namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 对于 XML 架构，这通常是`targetNamespace`属性的架构。For XML Schemas, this will typically be the `targetNamespace` property of the schema. 虽然此类存储 XML 架构和 XDR 架构，但所有方法和属性，接受或返回仅适用于 XML 架构。Although this class stores both XML Schemas and XDR schemas, any method and property that takes or returns an applies to XML Schemas only. 此版本的产品支持位于 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 架构建议http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1和http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2。This version of the product supports the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Schema recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1 and http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2. XML 架构必须引用 W3C 架构命名空间`http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema`其架构元素中。An XML Schema must reference the W3C Schema namespace `http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema` in its schema element. 请参阅有关示例的方法。See the method for an example. `XmlSchemaCollection` 可以通过使用以进行高效的数据验证。`XmlSchemaCollection` can be used by for efficient data validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类已过时 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已被取代类。The class is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 以下示例将验证 XML 文档使用`XmlSchemaCollection`。The following example validates an XML document using the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CPP/aa.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/CS/aa.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaCollection.Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaCollection.Basic/VB/aa.vb#1)]

The object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`属性用于标识此架构。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果所添加的架构包含对其他命名空间引用 (通过`include`和`import`元素)，应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，默认始终使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认`XmlUrlResolver`无用户凭据用于解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 仅出于验证目的加载了对这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构中，这些其他架构将不显式添加到架构集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，它们不使用任何集合方法或属性可以访问。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源都位于需要身份验证的网络资源，请使用采用重载作为其自变量之一并指定`XmlResolver`使用必要的凭据。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`正在使用访问属性，`Add`方法使用`XmlResolver`指定的属性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

param.name: schema
param.span: 要添加到该集合的 。

span.span: The you want to add to this collection.

summary.span: 将在给定集合（包括其关联架构）中定义的所有命名空间添加到该集合。

span.span: Adds all the namespaces defined in the given collection (including their associated schemas) to this collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所添加的架构包含对其他命名空间引用 (通过`include`和`import`元素或`x-schema`属性)，应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，默认始终使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认`XmlUrlResolver`无用户凭据用于解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 仅出于验证目的加载了对这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构中，这些其他架构将不显式添加到架构集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，它们不使用任何集合方法或属性可以访问。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源都位于需要身份验证的网络资源，请使用采用重载作为其自变量之一并指定`XmlResolver`使用必要的凭据。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`正在使用访问属性，`Add`方法使用`XmlResolver`指定的属性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Add (string ns, string uri);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema Add(string ns, string uri) cil managed
Public Function Add (ns As String, uri As String) As XmlSchema
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchema ^ Add(System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ uri);

param.name: ns
param.span: 与架构关联的命名空间 URI。

span.span: The namespace URI associated with the schema.

param.span: 对于 XML 架构，这通常是 。

span.span: For XML Schemas, this will typically be the .

param.name: uri
param.span: 指定要加载的架构的 URL。

span.span: The URL that specifies the schema to load.

summary.span: 将由给定的 URL 定位的架构添加到架构集合中。

span.span: Adds the schema located by the given URL into the schema collection.

returns.span: 添加到架构集合中的 ；如果所添加的架构为 XDR 架构，或者如果架构中有编译错误，则为 。

span.span: The added to the schema collection; if the schema being added is an XDR schema or if there are compilation errors in the schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ns`已关联与集合中的另一个架构，所添加的架构替换集合中的原始架构。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 例如，在以下 C# 代码中，从集合中移除 authors.xsd 和添加 names.xsd。For example, in the following C# code, authors.xsd is removed from the collection and names.xsd is added. ``` schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "authors.xsd"); schemaColl.Add("urn:author", "names.xsd"); ``` 如果`ns`是`null`和所添加的架构是 XML 架构，`Add`方法使用`targetNamespace`来识别在集合中的架构的 XML 架构中定义。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果所添加的架构包含对其他命名空间引用 (通过`include`和`import`元素或`x-schema`属性)，应用程序的信任级别将确定如何解析这些其他命名空间。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the trust level of the application determines how these other namespaces are resolved. (在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，默认始终使用)。(In the .NET Framework version 1.0, a default was always used). `Fully trusted code:` 默认`XmlUrlResolver`无用户凭据用于解析任何外部资源。`Fully trusted code:` A default `XmlUrlResolver` with no user credentials is used to resolve any external resources. 仅出于验证目的加载了对这些其他命名空间的架构。The schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构中，这些其他架构将不显式添加到架构集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，它们不使用任何集合方法或属性可以访问。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 如果这些外部资源都位于需要身份验证的网络资源，请使用采用重载作为其自变量之一并指定`XmlResolver`使用必要的凭据。If these external resources are located on a network resource that requires authentication, use an overload that takes an as one of its arguments and specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` 不解析外部引用。`Semi-trusted code:` External references are not resolved. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`正在使用访问属性，`Add`方法使用`XmlResolver`指定的属性。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` is being accessed using the property, the `Add` method uses the `XmlResolver` specified by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 以下示例将验证使用中存储的架构的 3 个 XML 文件`XmlSchemaCollection`。The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the `XmlSchemaCollection`. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下五个输入的文件：The sample uses the following five input files: `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#3)] `newbooks.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#4)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#5)] `schema1.xdr` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetNamespace`属性用于标识此架构。The `targetNamespace` attribute is used to identify this schema. 如果架构包含`include`和`import`引用其他命名空间，架构，这些其他命名空间加载仅出于验证目的的元素。If the schema contains `include` and `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构中，这些其他架构将不显式添加到架构集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，它们不使用任何集合方法或属性可以访问。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例将架构添加到集合。The following example adds a schema to the collection. 传递给`Add`设置所需的凭据访问架构中引用的任何外部资源所需的方法。An is passed to the `Add` method which sets the necessary credentials required to access any external resources referenced in the schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ns`已关联与集合中的另一个架构，所添加的架构替换集合中的原始架构。If `ns` has already been associated with another schema in the collection, the schema being added replaces the original schema in the collection. 如果`ns`是`null`和所添加的架构是 XML 架构，`Add`方法使用`targetNamespace`来识别在集合中的架构的 XML 架构中定义的属性。If `ns` is `null` and the schema being added is an XML Schema, the `Add` method uses the `targetNamespace` attribute defined in the XML Schema to identify the schema in the collection. 如果所添加的架构包含对其他命名空间引用 (通过`include`和`import`元素或`x-schema`属性)，仅出于验证目的加载这些其他命名空间的架构。If the schema being added contains references to other namespaces (through `include` and `import` elements or the `x-schema` attribute), the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 与原始架构中，这些其他架构将不显式添加到架构集合。Unlike the original schema, these other schemas are not explicitly added to the schema collection. 因此，它们不使用任何集合方法或属性可以访问。As a result, they are not accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler ValidationEventHandler;
.event class System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler ValidationEventHandler
public: event System::Xml::Schema::ValidationEventHandler ^ ValidationEventHandler;

summary.span: 设置事件处理程序，以接收 XDR 和 XML 架构验证错误的相关信息。

span.span: Sets an event handler for receiving information about the XDR and XML schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些事件发生时这些架构添加到集合。These events occur when the schemas are added to the collection. 如果未提供事件处理程序，上任何验证错误引发其中是`XmlSeverityType.Error`。If an event handler is not provided, an is thrown on any validation errors where the is `XmlSeverityType.Error`. 若要指定事件处理程序，定义一个回调函数，并将其添加到`ValidationEventHandler`。To specify an event handler, define a callback function and add it to the `ValidationEventHandler`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是.NET Framework 2.0 版中过时，并已替换为类。The class is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置事件处理程序以处理无效的 XML 架构。The following example shows how to set an event handler to handle invalid XML Schemas. [!code-cpp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CPP/schemaevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/CS/schemaevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/VB/schemaevent.vb#1)] 前面的示例使用文件`invalid.xsd`作为输入。The preceding example uses the file `invalid.xsd` as input. [!code-xml[XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchema.ValidationEventHandler/XML/invalid.xsd#2)]
